person.persName: Benjamin J. Beall (Campbell County, Kentucky, farmer, soldier, and justice of the peace)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, farmer, soldier, and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Dora Beall. Father of Edward Beall, Lizzie Beall, Duke Beall, Alice Beall, Maria Beall, Fannie Beall, and Laura Beall. Farmer in Alexandria, Kentucky, in 1860. Carpenter in Campbell County in 1863. Captain in the 10th Regiment Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (C.S.A.) and the 14th Regiment Kentucky Volunteer Cavalary (C.S.A.) from March 1863 to January 1864. Justice of the peace in Campbell County in 1864. Clerk pro-tem of the Campbell Circuit Court in 1864.
